vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Keniz(?), only mentioned at Gen.15.19
§ Kenezite or Kenizzites = "descendant of Kenaz"
descendants of Kenaz
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基尼洗族 这个陽性專有名詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 "基納斯的後裔"
基納斯的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基尼洗族 这个阳性专有名词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 "基纳斯的后裔"
基纳斯的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.32.12;
son of: Jephunneh (H3312);
brother of: Caleb (H3612);
father of: Othniel (H6274) and Seraiah (H8304J); also called Kenizzite at Num.32.12; 1x,14;
Group of qe.naz (קְנַז "Kenaz" H7073I)
§ Kenezite or Kenizzites = "descendant of Kenaz"
descendants of Kenaz
